title: Purple Heart Recipient* PFT Commenter AKA The Ghost of Manhattan
description:
On today's ZBT we've got 5 rounds in the magazine ... Round 1: Oftentimes, military stories can end up like a dick measuring contest. If that contest happened, Canada would beat the pants off of the United States. Round 2: PFT commenter is the ghost of barstool HQ3 and we have him on the show to get some advice from a real Top Gun. Round 3: The Golden Knights had a little accident that triggered the Capitol Police locking down the Capitol building. Round 4: In a story that might be the most PFC story of all time, an Army PFC decides to go to basic training bases in order to sell vape cartridges. Round 5: Kateâ€™s interview


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/ZeroBlog30
